songs.title: Hold Up
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus:]
Man up in the… drunk and..
You’re feeling what?
Pop, drunk and…
Hold up, hold up!
Man, I’m.. this way
Looking at what?
Drop, pop this way!
Hold up, hold up!
Man I’m..
Looking at what?...
Hold up, hold up!
Man, I’m feeling…. Blow
You’re feeling what?
..blow!
…the purple the whit
You got it all in this trunk and you gonna sling…
I don’t care who’d be running.. who’s in charge
..he gonna be hard to find like…
…tell him he’s been…
..last niggers coming through, I though you knew!
We got gangstas, hoods, felons rollers, shooters… even midnight…
And we don’t…confrontation, we embrace it
Ain’t the fear, so dick in the ..we can taste it!
…you can get down or get down, nigga, what’s up?
.. you can keep your eyes opened
So you can see how we’re doing, homie!

[Chorus:]
.. I got my black women, I hope …
Looking for a couple of bucks to get down and slap it up
..it’s like some dice!
I’m squashing out the chatter when you see my gangsta …
Hit the block with a couple of.. wait to do some decent…
..out me down, baby I gotta…
..the drink ‘till the bar is empty and..
…yeah, that’s my squad
..yeah, that’s my job!

[Chorus:]
Bitch, I’m back from the.. fuck the judge, fuck the DA,..
I just got home, I’m…
..never hit BC!
Like all the pussy rappers…
Niggers talk a lot of shit but ‘em…
We recognize real so I’m highly respected
Ever since I was 17… a legend in Texas!
..murder keep the head high
Ain’t no justice in this country, niggers is …
..years on the block
I got a team…
Cause niggers can’t fade me!
Use your.. you know who…

[Chorus:]
